bio: Oluwawumiju Oluwaseyi is a Technical consultant and the CEO/MD of Convenant Technologies, He is also an MCT REGIONAL LEAD AND MVP FOR OFFICE SERVER AND SERVICES and founder of MCTNAIJA-microtechxTechUSERGROUP. Convenant Technologies is a Certified Partner with Microsoft in Lagos, Nigeria. He is also a senior consulting partner for Convenant Technologies on Microsoft infrastructure with over 17 yearsâ€™ experience and, he is a fellow of the institute of information Management Africa one of the highest honor for Management of data. Suffice it to say, that championing campaign for SharePoint, Microsoft Team, Yammer, Microsoft Azure and Cloud technology strictly from a value point of view in medium and large organizations is the mainstay of his business interest in WECA and the response as well as prospect from the Nigerian marketplace for instance, is no doubt a boost to his business outlook in Africa.
